name: Mednaffe Portable
short_description:
Mednaffe Portable combines the Mednafen emulator, the Mednaffe front end, some GTK+ components and a portable launcher into one complete* ready to use out of the box package that does not require installation to use.

The open source Mednafen emulator will play games made for:
Atari Lynx*
Neo Geo Pocket (Color)
WonderSwan
GameBoy (Color)
GameBoy Advance
Nintendo Entertainment System
Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Super Famicom
Virtual Boy
PC Engine/TurboGrafx 16 (CD)*
SuperGrafx
PC-FX*
Sega Game Gear
Sega Genesis/Megadrive
Sega Master System
Sony PlayStation*

* BIOS file(s) required (not included)

1. Extract the package to anywhere and run MednaffePortable.exe
2. Add ROM folder(s)
3. Select and launch game to play

Here are a few useful hotkeys:
F1 Help
ALT+SHIFT+(#) Set controls for player (#)
F5 Save State
F7 Load State
ALT+S Enable Rewind function
BACKSPACE Rewind game
F10 Reset
ALT+ENTER Fullscreen
ESC or F12 Exit Mednafen
summary: Portable all in one, easy to use Mednafen Emulator package for Windows
